english.segment1: Chorus: It's nice to be at peace with You. It's fine with me to be close to You
english.segment2: My eyes are fixed on You, oh Lord. I see You, I see You. My hands are clean. My heart is pure. You washed me, thank You
english.segment3: I used to be attracted to. The things of this world. And I used to be at war with You. Now I'm fighting on Your side
english.segment5: My love for You is unashamed. I love You, I love You. My guilt is gone, I'm free to fly. Inside, inside
english.segment6: I used to be entangled by. The things of this world. And I used to seem so far from You. Now I feel You by my side
